alert.note: Alert for Chase; Hayes (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 05 at 7:44PM CDT until May 05 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Chase County in southwestern Nebraska... Hayes County in southwestern Nebraska... * Until 830 PM CDT/730 PM MDT/. * At 743 PM CDT/643 PM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Enders, or 10 miles east of Imperial, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Imperial, Hayes Center, Wauneta, Enders, Enders Reservoir State Recreation Area, Hamlet, Center Dam Campground and Area A Campground. This includes Highway 61 between mile markers 29 and 42. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
